title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.5 - Method of payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5002.5 - Method of payment

State Regulations

Payments for prior/previous service must be made in multiples
of one year except when less than one year of service has been rendered during
the year claimed. Under no circumstances will credit for prior/previous service
be granted until payment is made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5002.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
